Uses of Interface
io.permazen.encoding.Encoding

Packages that use Encoding
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
io.permazen.cli.parse
Permazen parsing related classes.
io.permazen.core
Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
io.permazen.encoding
Permazen Encodings.

    Encoding for any Java type that can be encoded and ordered as a String.
    class

    An Encoding implementation for any Java type that can be encoded uniquely as a String.

    Non-null String type.
    class

    Composite encoding constructed from the concatenation of two component encodings.

    class 
    Tuple5Encoding<V1,V2,V3,V4,V5>
    Composite encoding constructed from the concatenation of five component encodings.
    class 
    TupleEncoding<T extends Tuple>
    Superclass for Encodings created from the concatenation of other Encodings.
